name: user_change
desc: A team member's data has changed.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A team member's data has changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					users:read 				 The user_change event is sent to all connections for a team when a team member updates their profile or data. Clients can use this to update their local cache of team members. Use the users.profile.set method to update user profile data.
